title: Illiquid loans, investor demands: Blue Owl's software lending triggers another quake in private credit
summary_full: Blue Owl, a direct lender specializing in loans to the software industry, said it had sold $1.4 billion of its loans to institutional investors at 99.7% of par value.
summary_public: Blue Owl, a direct lender specializing in loans to the software industry, said it had sold $1.4 billion of its loans to institutional investors at 99.7% of par value.
